item.title: Backblaze B2 API pricing
item.description: The Backblaze B2 Native API, introduced alongside Backblaze B2 back in 2015, provides a low-level interface to B2 Cloud Storage.

item.title: AWS Map
item.description: Networking The AWS backbone network connects AWS Regions, Availability Zones, and the Internet.

item.title: GPT-4 chat demo
item.description: Attention The chat was saved to demonstrate how to ask GPT-4 questions and provide hints. The formula may be incorrect.

item.title: Reputable vendors offering free LLM API
item.description: Cerebras Cerebras provides a generous free tier, but tokens per minute is slightly more limited than others.

item.title: Best way to add path to PATH environment variable
item.description: Solution if [[ ! "$PATH" == *your_path* ]]; then PATH="${PATH:+${PATH}:}your_path" fi Explanation [[ ! "$PATH" == *your_path* ]] checks if PATH contains your new path already, hence avoiding duplicates.

item.title: Here document
item.description: Parameter expansion Quote the word in here-documents to inhibit any expansion.

item.title: Line editing
item.description: Read man 3 readline for more information.
